App.Appliacation.PaymentMessage: , hereby declare that all the information and documents submitted by me on the Raje Yashwantrao Holkar Scheme Portal are true, correct, and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief. I understand that in case any information or document is found to be false, fabricated, misleading, or suppressed, my application shall be rejected, and the benefits granted under the scheme will withdrawn. Further, I am aware that submitting false information or forged documents is a punishable offence under Section 417, 419, and 420 of the Indian Penal Code (IPC) and relevant provisions of the Information Technology Act, 2000. I shall be held solely responsible for any legal consequences arising from the submission of incorrect or fraudulent information.
App.Appliacation.ExistingApplicant: As you are Existing Student in Hostel, So You can not add more hostel. Please click on Next button to Proceed.
App.Appliacation.PastNote: If the applicant is pursuing an undergraduate or postgraduate course, they should include their 10th and 12th or Diploma marks and details under past qualifications.
App.Appliacation.To change a new or existing applicant ty: To change a new or existing applicant type and type of course, you have to delete the first past qualification and then the current qualification.
App.Appliacation.Your application was rejected as it was: Your application was rejected as it was not filled through the proper flow. Please select New and Hostel in the personal page details and complete the application form.
App.Appliacation.If you change service type then your pre: If you change the type of scheme, your previous application will be cancelled, you will have to verify all the data and save all the pages and submit your application. Later the application will be sent for scrutiny.
App.Appliacation.bankdetailsConcern: I hereby declare that the information provided in this application, including my bank account details, is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I confirm that the submitted bank account details are genuine and valid. I understand that if any information provided by me is found to be false or incorrect, I will be liable for the cancellation of all benefits granted by the Social Justice and Special Assistance Department, including hostel accommodation and financial assistance. I further agree to comply with all the rules and regulations set forth by the Social Justice and Special Assistance Department regarding the submission and verification of bank details. I acknowledge that once my bank details are uploaded, I will not be able to modify or update them.
